moves.1. d4 d5 2. e3 Bf5: my standard reply, in any Queens opening...
moves.3. Bd3 Bg6: not buckling: we will trade on g6...
moves.7. Qe2 Bd6 8. g3 f5 9. Ng1: White is running out of options...
moves.15... b5 16. b4 Kd7 17. c3 e5 18. dxe5 B: by now, Whites' possibilites get exhausted: not so for Black...
moves.22. Kc2 Kc7 23. Kb3 a5 24. bxa5 Nxa5+ 25: White has suffered a decisive loss of tempo: the a-file, is Blacks' new target...
moves.41... Nb3: claiming Whites' last tempo: there are no moves left...
moves.42. Rh8: last attempt, to make any play...
moves.42... Kc7: in this position, White timed out: Black had still 4:53 on the clock...

gameName: Fierce Queen proving her point again?
